package.name: arcs_cohort_gazebo_sim
package.description: The `arcs_cohort_gazebo_sim` package provides a Gazebo simulation environment for the ARCS Cohort robot, enabling users to simulate the robot's behavior in various world configurations. It integrates with ROS 2 and Gazebo to support robot control, sensor simulation (e.g., Stereolabs Zed camera, LiDAR), and teleoperation using joysticks or keyboards.
